about_the_game:
Welcome to Ukraine Defender, the ultimate aerial adventure where you take control of a badass Ukrainian plane and face off against the evil Russian Z forces! You have the power to shoot down enemy planes and throw bombs at their tanks, rocket launchers, ships, buildings, oil tanks, and even unsuspecting pigs and cows!

But don't let the excitement cloud your judgment, the clock is ticking with a built-in timer of only 500s, so you need to act fast and rack up the highest score possible before it's too late! And beware, as you fight to protect Ukraine, your enemies will fight back, and if your plane takes too much damage, it's game over.

Keep an eye on the top of the screen where the blue-yellow bar indicates the health level of Ukraine, which is directly tied to your success. As you soar through the air, you'll need all your skills to navigate your plane, which can be quite challenging to maneuver. But don't worry, there's a secret weapon in your arsenal, slow-motion mode, which you can activate during your flight to give yourself an edge and help you triumph over the enemy forces.

So, do you have what it takes to be the ultimate fighter in Ukraine Defender? It's time to find out!

name: Ukraine Defender

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7 and UP
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx980
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: Get ready to defend Ukraine in the intense, action-packed Combat Flight Simulator 2022! Take control of a fighter jet and engage in a race against the clock(500s) to defeat the invading Russian Z forces.Can you save Ukraine before it's too late? Get ready to find out in Combat Flight Simulator 2022!
